_notes: Deletes a promotion branch — called on ALL terminal paths
Idempotent: 200 = deleted, 404 = already deleted (both are success)
Must be called even on error paths to avoid branch leakage
Process C: on error, delete branch in outer catch before returning
Process D: after successful merge and packaging, delete as final cleanup
Reject/Deny: delete branch when promotion is rejected or denied

_lifecycle_paths.approve: Process D: merge → package → deploy → DELETE branch
_lifecycle_paths.error: Process C outer catch → DELETE branch before error response
